nodes.text: Aklee Skorba was a Human male pilot who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Aklee Skorba appeared aboard a starship in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
